song_lyrics: Sakhī jone hasī haḷve Harivar, khānt dharī khele...
Premvatīno kar pakḍīne, nāche Shrī Ghanshyām,
Pag ṭhamke, ghaṇī ghamke, dharā dhamke, joī chamke,
Than than than than nāch karīne, chitt hare chitt chor,
Bole kālu, lāge vā’lu, te nihāḷu, dukh tāḷu,
Jhabalu ne ṭopī shir shobhe, kanṭhe motī māḷ,
Khabhe paṭko, mukh maṭko, kar laṭako, ur aṭko,
Rūḍī nāḍī, na chhupāḍī, chhe agāḍī, jou dāḍī,
Sakhī far far far far fūdaḍī fartā,
Sukhdātā, juve mātā, jagtrātā, mukh gātā,
Sakhī prāṇ Hari parvash kīdhā chhe,
Bahu kāḷ e dayāḷ, jīvo bāḷ, pratipāḷ,
title: Sakhī jone hasī haḷave Harivar

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-210: Acharya Viharilalji Maharaj

Category: Utsavna Pad
